page.title: 04NOTABLE EVENTS IN BRIDGEND
page.content: A recent event in Bridgend is the opening of the new{Tesco Superstore}on the site of the last cattle market.Its easy parking facilities attract more shoppers from surrounding areas and this has also improved the trade of other non-food shops in the town. A{new general hospital,}the Princess of Wales,is to open shortly.It is reported to have the most modern facilities in Europe and is carpeted throughout.It will provide many jobs in the area. The{Flood Prevention Scheme}on the River has been completed.Many people are pleased that it has been built, although many believe that it spoils the character of the Town. New multi-storey{Ogwr Borough Council {Offices}are being built at Angel Street, resulting in the removal of the Evergreen Hall.
